properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 6:56AM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Winter
Weather Advisory for snow and freezing rain, which is in effect
until noon CST today.


* WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow
accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. A light glaze of ice expected.

* WHERE...The southwest Texas Panhandle.

* WHEN...Until noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds of 20 to 30 MPH with higher
gusts may cause areas of blowing snow along with sharply reduced
visibilities.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY
